title: BBC Local Live: Suffolk on Wednesday, 30 March 2016 - BBC News
summary: a man in his eighties has died and another is seriously injured in a bungalow fire in ipswich .
a van driver has been airlifted to addenbrooke 's hospital following a two-vehicle collision on the a12 at wrentham .
midfielder kevin bru is a doubt for ipswich town 's trip to wolves on saturday .
more news , sport , travel and weather updates from 08:00 on friday .

documents.title: that 's it for wednesday 's suffolk live
text: we 're signing off now but worry not , we 'll be back in the morning bringing you the usual news , sport , travel and weather updates from 08:00 .
do n't forget you can get in touch too , to send us any of suffolk that you 'd like to share with the rest of the county , or to flag up any news stories we 're not mentioning .
you can contact us via facebook , send us an email , or get in touch via twitter .

documents.title: henshall joins kilmarnock
text: former blues winger alex henshall has joined scottish premier league side kilmarnock on a short-term deal until the summer , having left portman road in january .
author: TWTD.co.uk

documents.title: overnight weather : rain at first , becoming drier later
text: turning a little cloudy with the risk of a shower this evening and for the first part of the night , but drier later with clear spells which will allow temperatures to drop close to freezing in places .
lows of 0c ( 32f ) under clear skies .
thursday will again start mostly fine , with a chance of showers later .
get more on the forecast where you live from bbc weather .
author: Alex Dolan
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: leiston transgender woman speaks out , in the hope of helping others
text: a transgender woman , from leiston , says she wants to highlight the difficulties she 's experienced in her journey to become a woman in the hope it helps others .
jennifer jo lees , who used to be mark , has secretly dressed as a woman in the past , but gave up when her family found out .
she says : `` i got loads of stick and grief in leiston .
i was taunted , had my name called out to me in the street , really making my life a hell . `` .
she 's now been living full-time as a woman for two weeks .
author: Linda Walker
BBC Radio Suffolk

documents.title: early evening headlines : motorcyclist killed in ipswich collision named a12 reopens at wrentham
text: our final look at suffolk 's top stories for today :
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: new date for bury-sudbury a134 derby after u-turn left 'nasty taste '
text: the second instalment of the west suffolk a134 derby between bury town and afc sudbury will take place in two week 's time today ( march 30 ) , on wednesday , april 13 ( 7.45pm ) .
author: Bury Free Press

documents.title: travel : fuel spill causes problems on a12 at martlesham
text: the a12 is partially blocked in martlesham and there 's queuing traffic in both directions on the a1214 junction , because of a broken down lorry and a fuel spillage .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: returning patterson on target as u21s beat crewe
text: goals from monty patterson , back after seven months out injured , myles kenlock , conor mckendry and schoolboy striker charlie brown saw town 's u21s to a 4-2 victory over crewe alexandra at playford road this afternoon .
author: TWTD.co.uk

documents.title: communities secretary says 'devolution wo n't be forced on anyone '
text: east anglian devolution will not be forced on anyone who does n't want it , according to communities and local government secretary greg clark who has been visiting the region today .
but mr clark , who was looking at proposals for a new garden town for wisbech , also suggested the scheme , which has a lot of local support , would happen more quickly if devolution was in place .
his plans to give norfolk , suffolk and cambridgeshire extra powers and a directly elected mayor have come in for criticism since they were announced a fortnight ago .
author: Andrew Sinclair
BBC Look East political correspondent

documents.title: cap on broads windpump taken off for repairs
text: the cap on horsey windpump has been successfully removed , despite blustery conditions earlier , and will now be sent to a millwright in suffolk for repair .
the pump , owned by the national trust , was built in 1912 to help drain land near the norfolk broads .
harsh weather and water leaks have caused timber to rot on the 15m ( 49ft ) high landmark 's cap and beams .
the sails were removed two years ago .
author: Andrew Turner
BBC Radio Norfolk

documents.title: motorcyclist named following fatal ipswich collision
text: the motorcyclist who died following a collision in ipswich yesterday has been named as duane cook , 42 , of kings way in the town .
police were called at about 16:15 to reports of a collision between a yamaha motorcycle and a honda car .
despite efforts to save mr cook , he died at the scene .
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tributes paid to 'real club man ' john roper
text: a well-known figure in the haverhill football community has died after a battle with cancer .
author: Haverhill Echo

documents.title: man has skull fractured in stowmarket assault
text: a man has been left with a fractured skull as well as swelling and bruising to his face following an assault in stowmarket on monday night , suffolk police says .
the 21-year-old was assaulted by two males in an alleyway off needham road , between 20:50 and 22:30 .
it 's thought he was knocked unconscious and when he came round , his bag containing a phone , wallet and other items was missing .
he was taken to ipswich hospital where he was x-rayed and treated for his injuries .
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: a12 reopens after lengthy closure
text: suffolk police have just announced that the a12 has reopened after this serious crash this morning :
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: changes to bury rugby club side facing redingensians at weekend
text: there will be changes to the side ahead of this weekend 's match against redingensians , where victory would see bury rugby club close in on safety in national league two , their director of rugby says .
gavin hogg said : `` joe lawson up a knock to his knee .
the fijians are away on army duty and matt edison is away on a skiing trip with school .
`` we 're hoping that this rest period will allow matt hem and mark kitson to come back from injury and push for a starting place or a place in the squad . ''
author: Ben Parker
BBC Suffolk Sport

documents.title: candidate for pcc withdraws his application
text: one of the candidates wanting to be suffolk 's police and crime commissioner has announced he 's no longer standing .
colin sutton , who lives in the county , led the investigation into the conviction of milly dowler 's murderer levi bellfield while working for the metropolitan police .
mr sutton has said he wo n't be standing for `` very good personal reasons '' .
author: Kelly McCormack
BBC Radio Suffolk

documents.title: travel : recovery work continues on a12 at wrentham
text: there are still delays in both directions on the a12 at wrentham between guildhall lane and wood lane as recovery work continues following an earlier accident between a double-decker bus and a van .
the driver of the van has been airlifted to addenbrooke 's hospital .
with `` critical '' injuries .
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: afternoon weather : dry at first but showers later
text: while some areas may remain dry throughout the day , showers will develop later with hail and thunder possible at times .
it 'll be breezy at first , with the winds easing later .
top temperature : 12c ( 54f ) .
today 's photo taken in long melford comes from bbc weather watcher bangalore babe .
if you 'd like to find out more about being a weather watcher , take a look at their website .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: lunchtime headlines : man dies in ipswich fire van driver 'seriously injured ' in a12 crash
text: a look at the main stories in suffolk :
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bru injury doubt for ipswich town trip to wolves
text: ipswich town midfielder and mauritius international kevin bru is an injury doubt for saturday 's trip to wolves after he missed yesterday 's 5-0 africa cup of nations qualifier loss to rwanda .
the 27-year-old has played 30 times for the blues this season scoring twice .
he is due back at the club tomorrow where he will be assessed .
author: Ben Parker
BBC Suffolk Sport

documents.title: fuchsia lane fatal fire : barking dog alerts neighbour to incident
text: suffolk fire service ( sfrs ) say they were alerted to the fatal fire in fuchsia lane in ipswich by a neighbour , who said her dog was barking .
ian bowell , area commander for sfrs , said : `` her dog raised the alarm to the lady next door who saw flames coming from the window and called us . ''
a man in his eighties died in the blaze .
another male resident of the bungalow is in a `` serious condition '' at chelmsford hospital .
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mcgoldrick could feature for u21s
text: striker david mcgoldrick could play for town 's u21s against crewe alexandra at playford road this afternoon as he continues his comeback from the hamstring injury which has kept him out of action since mid-december ( ko 1pm ) .
author: TWTD.co.uk

documents.title: rail disruption now affecting services from london to norwich
text: greater anglia is saying problems at gidea park are affecting travel towards shenfield , southend victoria , braintree , colchester town , clacton on sea , ipswich and norwich .
more updates as we get them , you can also find details from bbc travel .
author: Mariam Issimdar
BBC Local Live

documents.title: man in his 80s dies in fuchsia lane fire
text: more now on the news that an elderly man had died in a fire at fuchsia lane in ipswich this morning .
the man was in his eighties , suffolk police said .
they also confirmed other male resident at the bungalow has been transferred to chelmsford hospital , where he remains in a serious condition .
police are carrying out an investigation alongside suffolk fire and rescue to determine the cause of the fire .
no further information will be available until the man has been formally identified , police said .
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingpolice say man died in fuchsia lane fire
text: we 've just had confirmation from suffolk police that a man died in the bungalow fire in fuchsia lane , ipswich , this morning .
more soon
an elderly man has sadly died after house fire at fuchsia lane in # ipswich .
read more -
@ twitterid oh dear !
poor man ?

documents.title: van driver critical after a12 bus crash
text: a van driver has been air-lifted to addenbrooke 's hospital with `` serious '' injuries following a collision with a bus on the a12 at wrentham earlier today .
the driver of the bus , which was not carrying any passengers , is being treated at the james paget hospital .
police expect the road to remain closed until at least 13:30 .
author: Jodie Smith
BBC News

documents.title: 'search for travellers site is unsuccessful '
text: here 's today 's front page of the east anglian daily times :
author: East Anglian Daily Times

documents.title: motorcyclist dies following collision on felixstowe road
text: a male motorcyclist has died following a collision with a car on felixstowe road , ipswich , yesterday afternoon , suffolk police say .
the man was pronounced dead at the scene .
it 's same road where a biker and his pillion passenger were seriously injured on sunday night after the driver lost control of the bike .
author: Kelly McCormack
BBC Radio Suffolk

documents.title: wednesday 's weather : sunshine and showers
text: a largely dry day with sunny spells in store - but there 'll be showers too with hail and thunder possible at times .
breezy at first , easing later.top temperature : 12c ( 54f ) .
any remaining showers should die away tonight to leave a mostly dry night with some clear spells .
frost is possible towards eye by dawn given the largely clear skies and light winds .
lows of 1c ( 34f ) .
get more on the forecast where you live from bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: broken down lorry on a14 causes delays for drivers eastbound at orwell bridge
text: the a14 orwell bridge is partially blocked and there 's queuing traffic eastbound between j56 ( a137 wherstead ) and j57 ( a1189 nacton ) because of a broken down lorry .
congestion to j55 ( a1214 copdock )
author: BBC Travel

documents.title: van driver from a12 collision in 'critical condition '
text: the driver of a van injured in collision with a bus on the a12 at wrentham earlier is in `` critical condition '' at the james paget hospital .
it 's understood he may be airlifted to addenbrooke 's hospital in cambridgeshire later .
the bus driver is currently being treated at the scene - there were no passengers on the bus .
the road is likely to remain closed for at least another two hours.you can get the latest from bbc travel .
author: Guy Campbell
BBC Radio Suffolk

documents.title: two in hospital after bungalow fire
text: an investigation 's due to take place today into the cause of a fire in the early hours of this morning at a bungalow at fuchsia lane , off foxhall road in ipswich .
two people were taken to hospital following the blaze .
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : a12 diversion at henstead causing its own problems
text: back now to news that the a12 is closed in both directions at wrentham .
a diversion is in place , but as this photograph from bev lambert shows , it 's not an ideal route for larger vehicles .
we 'll bring you further details on the road closure as we get them .
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live

documents.title: two people taken to hospital after bungalow fire
text: two people have been taken to hospital after a fire in a bungalow in ipswich in the early hours of this morning .
firefighters , police and paramedics were called to fucshia lane off foxhall road shortly after 01:00 .
suffolk fire and rescue will return to the scene later to carry out an investigation .
author: Luke Deal
BBC Radio Suffolk

documents.title: serious injuries for van driver after a12 collision
text: a van driver has suffered serious injuries after a collision with a bus on the a12 just after 06:00 .
the road is closed in wrentham and there are delays in both directions between guildhall lane and wood lane .
we 'll have more on this later .
author: Guy Campbell
BBC Radio Suffolk

documents.title: in the news : motorcyclist dies in ipswich two hospitalised after fire in bungalow
text: your morning headlines :
author: Kelly McCormack
BBC Radio Suffolk

documents.title: welcome to wednesday 's suffolk live
text: good morning and thanks for joining us .
between now and 18:00 we 'll have the news , sport , travel and weather updates from across the county as they happen .
we also love sharing your photographs - here 's one taken in chedburgh this morning by weather watcher whimsical @ chedburgh
author: Philippa Taylor
BBC Local Live
